subject: Implementation of Core Banking solution (CBS) in NHAI with Syndicate Bank and Canara Bank.
text: Hrdfu <cfu <THf gifaarut TH4 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Ma 4a67, Too 4a87 3r TTTAI TATT 44H /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 MT T National Highways Authority of India QA. /Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 4-5 Qa 6, Mazr-10, Era;, Tf 8arft-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10_ Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn. 08.07.2009 POLICY MATTERS ADMINISTRATIONIFINANCE (51/2009) (Decision taken on Finance Division File No. NHAIIF&ACBS/2008-09/11-8) Sub: Implementation of Core Banking Solution (CBS) in NHAI with Syndicate Bank and Canara bank: With the approval of competent authority, Core Banking Solution (CBS) has already been implemented in NHAI with various PIUs having accounts with Canara Bank and Syndicate bank. Other units are also being covered in a phased manner: PIUs selected for CBS system will be intimated individually for operation of bank accounts through CBS system in due course of time. In the CBS system, PIUsICMUs will continue with the existing system of bank operation and payment and receipts. The Syndicate Bank and Canara bank have devised a mechanism that all paymentsl receipts at PIU through their account at local level will be cleared from a central account opened at HQ level, thus balance in the account at PIU level will be zero at the end of the day: The details of Accounts opened with these banks is as under: - Bank Current Account No GL Code_for accounting Syndicate bank, Transport 90621130000016 5635. Bhavan, New Delhi Canara bank Rajouri Garden 8598206000001 5644 New Delhi 2 For  implementation of CBS system in any PIUICMU , the Project Directors of the PIUs/CMUs selected for CBS system; will ensure that: (a) A new current account with the same branch of Syndicate bankICanara bank should be opened for CBS system: This account will be linked to central CBS account. Chequesl e-payment orders will continue to be issued by PIUICMU as per existing practice. The operation of bank account under CBS system should invariably be on joint signatory basis. (c) Password facility strictly for 'view and print option only' can be obtained from Bank to monitor the account. AIl payments made from the accounts of PIUICMU will be cleared at the end of the from central CBS account: Similarly all receipts deposited in PIUICMU Account will also be transferred to Central CBS Account at the end of the day: (e) Bank reconciliation will continue to be done by PIUICMU as per existing practice As all payments released from PIUs will be recouped from HQ central account;, there will be no necessity to keep balances in the current accountIFDRslshort term deposit at PIUICMU level: Contd.
